code: export default function Validation(values){var errors={};if(!values.firstname.trim()){errors.firstname='First name required.';}else if(!/^[A-Za-zА-Яа-я]+/.test(values.firstname.trim())){errors.firstname='Please enter a valid name.';}if(!values.lastname.trim()){errors.lastname='Last name required.';}else if(!/^[A-Za-zА-Яа-я]+/.test(values.lastname.trim())){errors.lastname='Please enter a valid name.';}if(!values.email){errors.email='Please enter your email, so we can send you a message.';}else if(!/\S+@\S+\.\S+/.test(values.email)){errors.email='Please enter a valid email address.';}if(!values.email2){errors.email2='Email confirmation required.';}else if(values.email2!==values.email){errors.email2='Please confirm that both email addresses are the same.';}if(!values.select.trim()){errors.select='Select the nature of your contact.';}if(!values.message.trim()){errors.message='Message is required.';}else if(values.message.length>1200){errors.message='1200 characters limit exceeded.';}return errors;}
